item.description:
On Thursdays, a group of us gets together for breakfast and a hike. Sometimes we hike in Myles Standish. Sometimes we go on one of the AMC hikes. Sometimes we just eat breakfast when it's pouring.

This week we'll try to join the AMC hike in Barnstable's Bridge Creek, which is described as "Woods, bogs and marshlands. Rte.6 to Exit 5. North on 149 to grassy triangle by First Parish Church. Meet at 9:45am. 2 hrs. ?"

AMC membership is not required.  Other details may be found at the AMC's Outdoors.org site.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club Up The Creek
